trans-unit.source: Controls deserialization by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class.
trans-unit.target: 控件反序列化的<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>类。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: During initialization, the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure dynamically generates and compiles a temporary class for deserialization that is derived from the abstract XmlSerializationReader class.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化，过程.NET Framework XML 序列化基础结构动态生成并编译的临时类派生自抽象 XmlSerializationReader 类的反序列化。

trans-unit.source: XmlSerializationReader is also implemented within the .NET Framework for deserialization of XML documents into <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> objects.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化的 XML 文档转换为.NET Framework 内还实现 XmlSerializationReader<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument>和<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>对象。</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument>

trans-unit.source: It does so for certain mappings between .NET Framework types and XML data types that are serialized through SOAP-encoded XML and are not root elements.

trans-unit.source: SOAP encoding allows a unique XML element to appear once within a SOAP message as a `multiRef` element identified by an `id` attribute.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 编码允许唯一的 XML 元素作为 SOAP 消息中出现一次`multiRef`标识元素`id`属性。

trans-unit.source: The `id` value can be referenced multiple times by `ref` attributes (or `href` attributes in SOAP 1.1) in substitute elements.
trans-unit.target: `id`值可由引用多次`ref`属性 (或`href`SOAP 1.1 中的属性) 替换元素中。

trans-unit.source: SOAP encoding is described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 1.1 规范第 5 节中介绍了 SOAP 编码。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether XML strings are translated into valid .NET Framework type names.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，确定是否将 XML 字符串转换成有效的.NET Framework 类型名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert.EncodeName%2A> method writes valid XML from invalid sources.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert.EncodeName%2A>方法从无效的源写入有效的 XML。</xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert.EncodeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> class can contain spaces, which are invalid as XML.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>属性<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>类可以包含空格，作为 XML 无效。</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert.DecodeName%2A> reads the encoded XML and restores it to the original value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert.DecodeName%2A>读取编码的 XML 并将其还原到原始值。</xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert.DecodeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema.Read%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> class cannot read such encoded XML.
trans-unit.target: 但是，<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema.Read%2A>方法<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>类不能读取如经过编码的 XML。</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: In that case, set the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter.EscapeName%2A> property to `false` to disable the encoding of the XML.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，设置<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter.EscapeName%2A>属性`false`禁用 XML 编码。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter.EscapeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: While deserializing XML documents into .NET Framework objects, the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure dynamically creates an instance of the FixupArrayRefs method for SOAP-encoded arrays whose data types map to .NET Framework reference types.
trans-unit.target: 当反 XML 文档序列化到.NET Framework 对象，.NET Framework XML 序列化基础结构动态创建针对 SOAP 编码的数组，其数据类型映射到.NET Framework 引用类型的 FixupArrayRefs 方法的实例。

trans-unit.source: The method then is called by <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationFixupCallback> to fill in the objects in the array.
trans-unit.target: 方法然后调用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationFixupCallback>来填充数组中的对象。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationFixupCallback>

trans-unit.source: During initialization, the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure dynamically generates and compiles a temporary class for deserialization that is derived from <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader>.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化过程，.NET Framework XML 序列化基础结构动态生成并编译反序列化从<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader>派生的临时类

trans-unit.source: During this process, the .NET Framework generates read methods that implement the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReadCallback> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 在此过程中，.NET Framework 生成实现的读取的方法<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReadCallback>委派。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReadCallback>

trans-unit.source: It does so for certain mappings between .NET Framework types and XML data types that are serialized through SOAP-encoded XML and are not root elements.
trans-unit.target: 它会因此对于某些.NET Framework 类型和 XML 数据类型，通过 SOAP 编码的 XML 序列并且不是根元素之间的映射。

trans-unit.source: Next, as necessary, a read method is called during deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，根据需要，在反序列化过程中调用读取的方法。

trans-unit.source: The abstract InitCallbacks method is where the temporary derived class creates an instance of and initializes read callback methods.
trans-unit.target: 抽象 InitCallbacks 方法是临时的派生的类中创建的实例并初始化读取回叫方法。

trans-unit.source: The `id` value can be referenced multiple times using `href` attributes (or `ref` attributes in SOAP 1.2) in substitute elements.

trans-unit.source: The protected members of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader> are intended for use only by derived classes that are used internally within the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 受保护的成员<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader>专门用于仅由.NET Framework XML 序列化基础结构在内部使用的派生类。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader>

trans-unit.source: SOAP encoding, as specified in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification, allows for elements referenced multiple times in a SOAP message (or optionally, just once) to be referred by an `href` attribute in the main message.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 编码，作为中指定的 SOAP 1.1 规范中，第 5 部分允许多次引用 SOAP 消息中的元素 (或 （可选），只需一次) 以引用的`href`中的主消息属性。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject> event occurs when such an element appears, but there is no `href` reference to it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject>事件发生时将出现此类元素，但没有任何`href`引用了该页。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject>

trans-unit.source: Add a handler method to <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject> to provide custom handling for unreferenced objects while the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> executes its <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 添加到处理程序方法<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject>提供的未引用的对象，而自定义处理<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>执行其<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject>

trans-unit.source: A unique string that is used to identify the unreferenced object, subsequently accessible through the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.UnreferencedObjectEventArgs.UnreferencedId*> property.
trans-unit.target: 用于标识未引用的对象，随后可通过访问的唯一字符串<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.UnreferencedObjectEventArgs.UnreferencedId*>属性。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.UnreferencedObjectEventArgs.UnreferencedId*>
